mapper.insert: insert into sys_goods( goods_id, factory_id, goods_name, goods_code, pinyin, Ename, unit, goods_img, purch_price, unit_price, remark, status, create_user, create_time )values( #{goodsId}, #{factoryId}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsCode}, #{pinyin}, #{ename}, #{unit}, #{goodsImg}, #{purchPrice}, #{unitPrice}, #{remark}, ${status}, #{createUser}, sysdate )
mapper.update: update sys_goods a set a.goods_name = #{goodsName}, a.goods_code = #{goodsCode}, a.pinyin= #{pinyin}, a.ename= #{ename}, a.unit =#{unit}, a.goods_img = #{goodsImg}, a.purch_price = #{purchPrice}, a.unit_price = #{unitPrice}, a.remark = #{remark}, a.status = ${status}, a.update_user = #{updateUser}, a.update_time = sysdate where a.goods_id = #{goodsId}
mapper.select: select t.goods_id, t.factory_id, t.goods_name, t.goods_code, t.pinyin, t.ename, t.unit, t.goods_img, t.purch_price, t.unit_price, t.create_user, t.create_time, t.update_user, t.update_time, t.remark, t.status from sys_goods t where t.goods_id = #{goodsId}

select tb.goods_id, tb.factory_id, tb.goods_name, tb.goods_code, tb.pinyin, tb.ename, tb.unit, tb.purch_price, tb.unit_price, tb.remark, tb.status, (select u.user_name from sys_user u where u.user_id=tb.create_user) as create_by_transformation, (select u.user_name from sys_user u where u.user_id=tb.update_user) as update_by_transformation, tb.goods_img from sys_goods tb where 1 = 1
and ( tb.goods_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.goodsName}),'%') or tb.goods_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.goodsName}),'%') or tb.pinyin like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.goodsName}),'%') or tb.Ename like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.goodsName}),'%') )
order by tb.create_time desc

select count(1) as totalCount from sys_goods tb where 1 = 1
and ( tb.goods_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.goodsName}),'%') or tb.goods_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.goodsName}),'%') or tb.pinyin like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.goodsName}),'%') or tb.Ename like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.goodsName}),'%') )
order by tb.create_time DESC
select t.goods_id as id ,t.goods_name as name from sys_goods t where t.status = #{status}
select t.goods_id as id,t.goods_name as name from sys_goods t where t.status = ${status} and t.factory_id = #{factoryId}

select t.goods_id as id,t.goods_name as name ,t.goods_img as goods_img , (select total from sys_repertory a where a.goods_id = t.goods_id ) as total from sys_goods t where t.status = ${status} and t.factory_id = #{factoryId} and t.goods_id in (select goods_id from sys_repertory)
select count(t.goods_id) as count from sys_goods t where t.goods_name = #{goodsName} or t.goods_code = #{goodsCode}
